item.source: Jack frost gives a cape when all skills 99

item.title: Jack frost gives a cape when all skills 99
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

#spoonfeedtuesdays
#p2oedition

[code=java] case 8517: // Jack Frost
final int COMPLETIONIST_CAPE_PRICE = 500000000; // 500M
boolean eligible = true;

        for (int i = 0; i < 25; i++) { // Looping through stats to see if any skill is not 99
                if (c.playerLevel[i] != 99) {
                        eligible = false;
                }
        }
       
        if (eligible && c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, COMPLETIONIST_CAPE_PRICE)) {
                c.getItems().deleteItem(995, COMPLETIONIST_CAPE_PRICE); // Removing the money (id, amount)
                c.getItems().addItem(19812, 1); // Giving the cape (id, amount)
                c.sendMessage("Jack Frost recognizes your talents and hands you the Completionist cape."); // Message
        } else if (!c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, COMPLETIONIST_CAPE_PRICE)) {
                c.sendMessage("You do not have enough coins to pay for the cape.");
                c.sendMessage("You need " + COMPLETIONIST_CAPE_PRICE + " coins.");
        } else {
                c.sendMessage("You aren't eligible for the Completionist cape, come back once you have maxed every skill.");
        }
    break;

[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Jack frost gives a cape when all skills 99

item.title: Jack frost gives a cape when all skills 99
item.dc:creator: @overload_sam overload sam
item.description:
@overload_sam wrote:

case 8517: //jack frost
for (int i = 0; i < 25; i++) {
if (c.playerLevel[i] == 99) { //check for skills
if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 500000000)) { //check for money
c.sendMessage(“Jack Frost recognizes your talents and hands you the Completionist cape.”); //message duh
c.getItems().deleteItem(995, 500000000); //remove money
c.getItems().addItem(19812, 1); //give cape
} else {
c.sendMessage(“All your skills must be 99 and you must have 500m”); //skill not 99
}
} //exit check
} //exit loop
break;

It keeps saying skills not 99 if they all are 99 but not got the money?

Read full topic

item.source: Jack frost gives a cape when all skills 99

item.title: Jack frost gives a cape when all skills 99
item.dc:creator: @overload_sam overload sam
item.description:
@overload_sam wrote:

At the moment jack frost will give you a cape if all your skills are 99 and charge you 500m if you have it but you dont have to have any money to get the cape.
I want it so it gives you the cape if you pay 500m and all your skills are 99

Can anyone help please i have included these codes to help you.

case 8517:
if ((c.playerLevel[0] == 99) && (c.playerLevel[1] == 99) && (c.playerLevel[2] == 99) && (c.playerLevel[3] == 99) && (c.playerLevel[4] == 99) && (c.playerLevel[5] == 99) && (c.playerLevel[6] == 99) && (c.playerLevel[7] == 99) && (c.playerLevel[8] == 99) && (c.playerLevel[9] == 99) && (c.playerLevel[10] == 99) && (c.playerLevel[11] == 99) && (c.playerLevel[12] == 99) && (c.playerLevel[13] == 99) && (c.playerLevel[14] == 99) && (c.playerLevel[15] == 99) && (c.playerLevel[16] == 99) && (c.playerLevel[17] == 99) && (c.playerLevel[18] == 99) && (c.playerLevel[19] == 99) && (c.playerLevel[20] == 99) && (c.playerLevel[21] == 99) && (c.playerLevel[22] == 99) && (c.playerLevel[24] == 99)) {
c.sendMessage(“Jack Frost recognizes your talents and hands you the Completionist cape.”);
c.getItems().deleteItem(995, 500000000);
c.getItems().addItem(19812, 1);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You need level 99 in all skills to receive this cape.”);
return;
}
break;

	case 2996:

if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(989,1) && c.getItems().freeSlots() >= 1) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(989, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(c.getPA().randomCrystal(), 1);
c.getDH().sendDialogues(38, 945);
} else {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(37, 945); }
break;

Read full topic
